      • checkPositive

        public static double checkPositive(double value,
                   String argName)
        Tests if value > 0.0d
        Parameters:
        value - a value to test
        argName - argument name for value, e.g., "strListSize" or "searchRegexLength"
        Returns:
        the validated value
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if argName is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if value of value <= 0.0d, or if argName is empty or whitespace
        See Also:
        checkNotPositive(double, String), checkNegative(double, String), checkNotNegative(double, String)
